title: Augmented Reality Game-Based Sustainability Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational environmental science and Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), with ability to use mobile devices
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment premised on digital device provision, with access to university laboratory/practical facilities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze sustainable urban design processes through AR-based simulations
Learners can generate three or more carbon neutrality scenarios using data provided in games
Learners can implement and evaluate sustainability solutions developed by teams using the PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach

resources: Unity3D or Similar AR Development Platform License

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
